description: Prospective science teachers learn strategies for the practical application of learning
theory to secondary school science classrooms. Topics include: the national science
standards movement and No Child Left Behind; inquiry learning in the science classroom;
lesson planning; teaching in the classroom and in the laboratory; technology; managing a
science laboratory; and continuing professional development.  Required field experience
component. Offered annually in the spring semester.  Prerequisite: EDUC 330.
